positive: Improved sound quality in the treble range
More accurate detection sensors compared to XM4
Quieter noise reduction compared to XM4
negative: For some users, overall sound quality has slightly deteriorated
For some users, depth of field increase during music playback may be excessive

positive: Great touch controls and physical buttons
Good sound quality with emphasis on mids and highs
Comfortable to wear for long periods
negative: Lack of ability to fold for storage
Potential concerns about creaking over time
